entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, INCREASING TO 15 TO 20 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 60
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS AROUND 50
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
LOWS AROUND 50

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
